description: The format is as follows:
A JSON object with objects named forms, validations and messages
The form-classes object contains forms arrayed for convenience of specifying validations
A form beginning with @ is a reference to the form-class following @ character.
A form-class and resolved references behave as a set (deduplicating arrayed forms).
Where !not! appears in a set then validation applies if the argument is not in the set.
The validations object contains an ordered array of validation objects.
whose keys name the preferred axes prefixed name (e.g., 'srt:CurrencyAxis'),
and values are a regular expression pattern.
Each validation object contains the following entries:
forms: arrayed forms or form references or single form or form reference,
xbrl-names, elo-names, and severities may be array (plural) or individual
xbrl-names: arrayed dei local names of XBRL elements,
elo-names: optional corresponding arrayed ELO schema names of XML elements,
xbrl-name: single local name of XBRL element,
elo-name: optional single ELO schema name of XML element,
store-db-name: optional ELO db name if elo value to be stored in EDGAR db
efm: section in EFM, e.g., 6.5.21,
validation: cell reference per FRD (replace below), required except for store-db-name entries
axis: optional, when an element has an axis specification
value: optional, when an element must have a certain value
value-for-reference-check: optional, when this fact must have a value for referenced fact condition check (default non-nil non-empty)
reference: optional, reference to another xbrl-name for dependent or co-dependent validations,
reference-value: optional, when a referenced fact must have a certqin value
source: inline or both
comment: optional, comment string
The messages object contains messages which may be ferenced by validations
The validation-legend object describes the codes in the validation object @validation value

form-classes.comment2: forms not subject to FAST act
form-classes.comment3: for SDR include both submission types (SDR, SDR/A, ...) and form types (K SDR, L SDR) because in previewing desktop mode only form type is provided

form-element-validations.comment: catch any submission type not explicity above with any form type not covered by the above, excluding Other

non-english name allowed

compare CurrentFiscalYearEndDate to headerFyEnd (as second ELO parameter to entity.fyEnd)

dei here because cover checked in following only for trading sym, not no-sym
cover here only checks trading symbol, if OTC may have no exchange

exclusive fact has first value, others have second (to n'th) value

(blank).validation: Blank – a non-null fact should not appear.

(blank-error).validation: Blank – a non-null fact should not appear.

x.validation: X - A non-null fact must appear, otherwise it is an XBRL ERROR

xv.validation: X - A non-null fact must appear with specified vcalue

f2.validation: F2 – One or both non-null facts should be present if EntityAddressAddressLine1 is present.

n.validation: N – A fact should be present with value "false".

o.validation: O – A non-null fact may or may not appear.

ov.validation: X - A non-null fact may or may not appear but if it does, with specified vcalue

o2.validation: O2 – One or both non-null facts should be present

o3.validation: O3 – One, two, or all three non-null facts should be present (they should not all be absent).

og.validation: OG - If EntityEmergingGrowthCompany is "true", then a non-null fact should appear, else a non-null fact may appear with value “false” or it may be absent.

ol1.validation: OL1 – A non-null fact may be present only if EntityAddressAddressLine1 is present.

ol2.validation: OL2 – A non-null fact may be present only if EntityAddressAddressLine2 is present.

oph.validation: Oph – A non-null fact should be present if and only if a non-null LocalPhoneNumber is present.

oth.validation: Oth – A non-null fact should be present if and only if DocumentAccountingStandard value is "Other".

r.validation: R – A non-null fact should be present.

a.validation: When this fact is non-empty, referenced fact must have reference-value (AmendmentFlag, true).

ru.validation: Ru – A fact should be present with a US state as a value.

ou.validation: Ou – A fact may be present with a US state as a value.

op.validation: Op – Non-null facts may exist (and if 'cover', be visible) for both the fiscal year and fiscal focus, or nether.

sr.validation: SR – For inline, a non-null fact should be present if and only if DocumentShellCompanyReport is true.

t.validation: T – A non-null fact should be present if and only if a SecurityTitle is present.

ot1.validation: OT1 – One non-null fact, but not both, may be present.

t1.validation: T1 – One non-null fact, but not both, should be present if and only if Security12bTitle is present.

tf3.validation: TF3 – Exactly one of the facts should be "true" and the other two "false".

tr.validation: TR – For inline, a non-null fact should be present if and only if DocumentTransitionReport is true.

te.validation: Tb – A non-null fact is required only if the Security12bTitle exists.  If ADR a non-null trading symbol is required.

y.validation: Y – A fact should be present with value "true".

security-axis.validation: Security fact can only have single non-ADR entry in default context otherwise all in specific axis contexxts, not both.

e503.validation: Exclusive dependency between fact and item 5.03

ws.validation: WS1 – Only one of the facts should be "true".

wv.validation: WV1 – Only one of the facts should be "true".

et1.validation: ET1 – EntityEmergingGrowthCompany is "false", then no fact should exist for EntityExTransitionPeriod.  If "true" non-null fact should exist.

messages.dq-{efmSection}-{tag}-Missing: Submission type {subType} {severityVerb} have a non-empty value for {tag} in {context}.
messages.dq-{efmSection}-{tags}-Missing: Submission type {subType} {severityVerb} have a non-empty value for at least one of {tags} in {context}.
messages.dq-{efmSection}-{tag}-Unexpected: Submission type {subType} {severityVerb} not have a value for {tag} in the {context}.
messages.dq-{efmSection}-{tag}-{value}: In submission type {subType}, {tag} value {severityVerb} have {value} in the {context}.
messages.dq-{efmSection}-{tag}-Value: In submission type {subType}, {tag} value {severityVerb} have {value} in the {context}.
messages.dq-{efmSection}-{tag}-{otherTag}: In submission type {subType}, {tag} value {severityVerb} have value "{value}" in the same context as {otherTag}, {contextID}.
messages.dq-{efmSection}-{tag}-{otherTag}-Missing: In submission type {subType}, {tag} requires {otherTag} in the same context, {contextID}.
messages.dq-{efmSection}-{tag}-Value-{otherTag}-M: In submission type {subType}, {tag} value "{value}" requires {otherTag} in the same context, {contextID}.
messages.dq-{efmSection}-{tag}-{otherTags}-Missin: In submission type {subType}, {tag} requires a non-empty value for at least one of {otherTags} in the same context, {contextID}.
messages.dq-{efmSection}-{tag}-{otherTag}-Exclusi: In submission type {subType}, either {tag} or {otherTag} {severityVerb} have a value, but not both, in context, {contextID}.
messages.dq-{efmSection}-{tags}-Exclusive: In submission type {subType}, only one of {tags} {severityVerb} have a value, but not both, in context, {contextID}.
messages.dq-{efmSection}-{tags}-Exclusive-Values: In submission type {subType}, exactly one of {tags} {severityVerb} have the value "{value}" and the others {severityVerb} have the value "{otherValue}".
messages.dq-{efmSection}-{tags}-Exclusive-Value: In submission type {subType}, only one of {tags} {severityVerb} have a value {value}.
messages.dq-{efmSection}-{tags}-Inclusive: In submission type {subType}, at least one of {tags} {severityVerb} have a value.
messages.dq-{efmSection}-{tags}-Both: In submission type {subType}, both or neither of {tags} {severityVerb} have a value.
messages.dq-{efmSection}-{tag}-{otherTag}-Depende: In submission type {subType}, {tag} {severityVerb} have a value if and only if {otherTag} has a value in context {contextID}.
messages.dq-{efmSection}-{tag}-{otherTags}-Depend: In submission type {subType}, {tag} {severityVerb} have a value if one of {otherTags} has a value in context {contextID}.
messages.dq-{efmSection}-{tag}-{otherTag}-Depende: In submission type {subType}, {tag} {severityVerb} be provided if and only if {otherTag} has value "{value}" in context {contextID}.
messages.dq-{efmSection}-{tag}-{otherTag}-Inclusi: In submission type {subType}, either {tag} or {otherTag} should have a value, or both.
messages.dq-{efmSection}-{tag}-{otherTag}-Exclusi: In submission type {subType}, {tag} {severityVerb} have a value if and only if {otherTag} has a value in context {contextID}.
messages.dq-{efmSection}-{tags}-{otherTag}-Exclus: In submission type {subType}, one of {tags} {severityVerb} have a value if and only if {otherTag} has a value in context {contextID}.
messages.dq-{efmSection}-{tags}-{otherTags}-Exclu: In submission type {subType}, one of {tags} {severityVerb} have a value if one of {otherTags} has a value in context {contextID}.
messages.dq-{efmSection}-{tag}-{headerTag}-Depend: In submission type {subType}, {tag} {severityVerb} have a value if and only if header element {headerTag} is provided.
In submission type {subType}, when {tag} has a value "{value}", header element {headerTag} {severityVerb} have a value "{otherValue}".
messages.dq-{efmSection}-{tag}-Security-Axes: In submission type {subType}, {tag} {severityVerb} have values without axes if a single non-ADR member, otherwise in separate contexts by axis member, but not both, in contexts {contextIDs}.
messages.dq-0514-Hidden-Cover-Page-Fact-Not-Refer: Submission type {subType} has {n} cover page fact(s) in ix:hidden that were not referenced by any -sec-ix-hidden style property: (namesOfTags).
messages.dq-0540-{tag}-Value: In submission type {subType}, {tag} value "{value}", is not equivalent to header element {headerTag} value "{valueOfHeaderTag}" in the {context}.
messages.dq-0540-{headerTag}-Unexpected: Header element {headerTag} value "{value}" is not applicable for {subType} submission type.
